channel.title: A couple of questions
channel.description:
Hey...I am wondering: -Does anyone have a link to a good 'mod island' tutorial...There was some when I had my old server and I am loooking for it...(I have searched these forums, google and some other forums...but no luck) -Does anyone know if there is hosting that can host this game?...Like if I were to rent a dedicated server could I run my game server on it?
Thanks - Colin Smiley
